title: Halloween Music and Sounds Audio Pack
description: A collection of 8 music loops, 18 jingles, 14 backgrounds tracks and 71 sound effects for your Halloween spooky projects!
longDescription:
A complete collection of 111 audio files for your spooky projects. Includes music, jingles, background ambient and sound effects!

→ File list

 

♫ Check the full audio preview on:

Youtube

Soundcloud

 

Package content:

Music:

8 seamless loop music files, suitable for lots of game genres and moods.

♫ Click here to check the preview.

 

Stings and events:

18 jingles for special events in your game, like a "level up", game over or when a ghost appears!

♫ Click here to check the preview.

 

Background ambiences:

14 loop audio files like scary winds, rains and creepy drone atmospheric soundscapes.

♫ Click here to check the preview.

 

Sound Effects.

71 sound effects like from bats, witch laughs, evil creatures, horror voices and interface sounds.

♫ Click here to check the preview.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 8 Music Loops
  • 18 Jingles/Stings for special events in game
  • 71 High Quality Sound Effects
  • 14 Background Ambient Loops

Number of Audio Wavs: 111

Number of Audio Cues: 111

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does music loop: Yes*

Minutes of audio provided: 35:17

Supported Development Platforms: Windows, Mac, Android, iOS, Oculus, Other

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows, Mac, Android, iOS, Oculus, Other

Important/Additional Notes: All files are stereo ".wav" and some files loop seamlessly.

releaseInfo.releaseNote: New Music available: Surf Music Upbeat!
